description.zh: Memos 是一个现代、开源、支持自托管的知识管理与笔记记录平台。它面向注重隐私的个人和组织，提供对数据的完全控制权。该平台轻量易用，支持跨平台访问，具备完整的 Markdown 支持和本地数据存储功能。
description.en: Memos is a modern, open-source, self-hosted knowledge management and note-taking platform. It is designed for privacy-conscious individuals and organizations who want full control over their data. The platform offers a lightweight, cross-platform solution with comprehensive Markdown support and secure local data storage.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 提供完整的数据所有权和隐私控制
- 轻量级高性能架构设计
- 无需授权费用，成本效益高
- 开源项目，社区活跃，持续更新

## 功能列表:

- 支持自托管及本地数据库存储
- 支持 Markdown 语法高亮等高级功能
- 支持 Linux、macOS、Windows 及容器化部署，跨平台访问
- 支持插入图片和嵌入内容等富媒体功能
- 提供 RESTful API 接口用于第三方集成
- 支持多种数据库（SQLite、PostgreSQL、MySQL）
- 支持自定义主题和品牌标识
- 提供 Docker 及 Docker Compose 部署选项
- 拥有完善的文档和社区支持
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Full data ownership and privacy control
- Lightweight and high-performance architecture
- Cost-effective with no licensing fees
- Open source with active community development

## Features:

- Self-hosted with support for local database storage
- Advanced Markdown support with syntax highlighting
- Cross-platform accessibility on Linux, macOS, Windows, and containers
- Rich media integration including images and embedded content
- RESTful API for third-party integrations
- Multiple database support (SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL)
- Configurable themes and branding options
- Docker and Docker Compose deployment options
- Comprehensive documentation and community support
